events.message: I ordered a jacket last week, but it arrived the wrong size. I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been identified as related to a refund request due to product size mismatch.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong-sized jacket.
Hello! I'm Sarah from customer support. I understand you wish to return your jacket for a refund. Let's sort this out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and its tags are intact for the refund process?
Sure, the order number is 123456789. The jacket is brand new, still has tags, and I havenâ€™t worn it at all.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated your refund request, and you will receive a return shipping label by email shortly.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the prompt response and look forward to the refund.
The refund process has been set up successfully. Once we receive the returned jacket, the refund will be processed within 5 business days.
We wanted to check in to confirm you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I got the label and sent the jacket back yesterday. Thank you for following up!
Your refund has been completed and the amount should reflect in your account shortly. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey about your refund experience.
I completed the survey and am very happy with how your team handled my refund request.
The case is now closed. Thank you for contacting support and please reach out if you need help in the future.
